Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") RunService = game:GetService("RunService") UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")
Animations = {}
ServerControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ServerControl") ClientControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ClientControl")
Rate = (1 / 60)
ToolEquipped = false
function SetAnimation(mode, value) if mode == "PlayAnimation" and value and ToolEquipped and Humanoid then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end local AnimationTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(value.Animation) table.insert(Animations, {Animation = value.Animation, AnimationTrack = AnimationTrack}) AnimationTrack:Play(value.FadeTime, value.Weight, value.Speed) elseif mode == "StopAnimation" and value then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop(value.FadeTime) table.remove(Animations, i) end end end end
function CheckIfAlive() return (((Character and Character.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Player and Player.Parent) and true) or false) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") ToolEquipped = true if not CheckIfAlive() then return end PlayerMouse = Player:GetMouse() end
function Unequipped() for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v and v.AnimationTrack then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() end end Animations = {} ToolEquipped = false end
function InvokeServer(mode, value) local ServerReturn pcall(function() ServerReturn = ServerControl:InvokeServer(mode, value) end) return ServerReturn end
function OnClientInvoke(mode, value) if mode == "PlayAnimation" and value and ToolEquipped and Humanoid then SetAnimation("PlayAnimation", value) elseif mode == "StopAnimation" and value then SetAnimation("StopAnimation", value) elseif mode == "MouseData" then return ((PlayerMouse and {Position = PlayerMouse.Hit.p, Target = PlayerMouse.Target}) or nil) end end
ClientControl.OnClientInvoke = OnClientInvoke Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer --Updated for R15 avatar by StarWars
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris") InsertService = game:GetService("InsertService")
NPCModel = InsertService:LoadAsset(319386664) NPC = NPCModel:GetChildren()[1]:Clone() Debris:AddItem(NPCModel, 1)
AxeManager = script:WaitForChild("AxeManager")
local function Create_PrivImpl(objectType) if type(objectType) ~= 'string' then error("Argument of Create must be a string", 2) end --return the proxy function that gives us the nice Create'string'{data} syntax --The first function call is a function call using Lua's single-string-argument syntax --The second function call is using Lua's single-table-argument syntax --Both can be chained together for the nice effect. return function(dat) --default to nothing, to handle the no argument given case dat = dat or {}
--make the object to mutate local obj = Instance.new(objectType) local parent = nil
--stored constructor function to be called after other initialization local ctor = nil
for k, v in pairs(dat) do --add property if type(k) == 'string' then if k == 'Parent' then -- Parent should always be set last, setting the Parent of a new object -- immediately makes performance worse for all subsequent property updates. parent = v else obj[k] = v end
--add child elseif type(k) == 'number' then if type(v) ~= 'userdata' then error("Bad entry in Create body: Numeric keys must be paired with children, got a: "..type(v), 2) end v.Parent = obj
--event connect elseif type(k) == 'table' and k.__eventname then if type(v) ~= 'function' then error("Bad entry in Create body: Key `[Create.E\'"..k.__eventname.."\']` must have a function value\ got: "..tostring(v), 2) end obj[k.__eventname]:connect(v)
--define constructor function elseif k == t.Create then if type(v) ~= 'function' then error("Bad entry in Create body: Key `[Create]` should be paired with a constructor function, \ got: "..tostring(v), 2) elseif ctor then --ctor already exists, only one allowed error("Bad entry in Create body: Only one constructor function is allowed", 2) end ctor = v
else error("Bad entry ("..tostring(k).." => "..tostring(v)..") in Create body", 2) end end
--apply constructor function if it exists if ctor then ctor(obj) end
if parent then obj.Parent = parent end
--return the completed object return obj end end
--now, create the functor: Create = setmetatable({}, {__call = function(tb, ...) return Create_PrivImpl(...) end})
--and create the "Event.E" syntax stub. Really it's just a stub to construct a table which our Create --function can recognize as special. Create.E = function(eventName) return {__eventname = eventName} end
Remover = script:WaitForChild("Remover")
NPCModule = require(191816425)
BaseUrl = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="
Sounds = {}
BasePart = Create("Part"){ Shape = Enum.PartType.Block, Material = Enum.Material.Plastic, TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom, Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2), CanCollide = true, Locked = true, Anchored = false, }
ReloadTime = 60 Duration = nil
NPCSpawned = false NPCReady = false
CurrentNPC = {}
DisplayModel = Tool:FindFirstChild("DisplayModel") if DisplayModel then DisplayModel:Destroy() end
ToolEquipped = false
ServerControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ServerControl") or Create("RemoteFunction"){ Name = "ServerControl", Parent = Tool, })
ClientControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ClientControl") or Create("RemoteFunction"){ Name = "ClientControl", Parent = Tool, })
--Handle.Transparency = 0 Tool.Enabled = true
function CreateHandle(Display) for i, v in pairs(Tool:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") and v ~= Handle then v:Destroy() end end Handle.Transparency = (((Display and not Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Tool.Parent)) and 0) or 1) if not Display or Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Tool.Parent) then return end local BaseAxe = BasePart:Clone() BaseAxe.Name = "Axe" BaseAxe.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) BaseAxe.CanCollide = false Create("SpecialMesh"){ Name = "Mesh", MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh, MeshId = (BaseUrl .. "315582041"), TextureId = (BaseUrl .. "315582230"), Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1), VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1), Offset = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0), Parent = BaseAxe, } local AxePositions = { (CFrame.new(-0.35, 0.475, 0.35, 0.982973099, 0.183749512, 0, -0.129930526, 0.695066929, -0.707106769, -0.129930526, 0.695066929, 0.707106769) * CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 8), (math.pi / 12), (math.pi / 12))), (CFrame.new(0.35, 0.475, 0.35, 0.982973099, -0.183749512, 0, 0.129930526, 0.695066929, -0.707106769, 0.129930526, 0.695066929, 0.707106769) * CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 8), -(math.pi / 12), -(math.pi / 12))), } for i, v in pairs(AxePositions) do local Axe = BaseAxe:Clone() local Weld = Create("Weld"){ Name = "Weld", Part0 = Handle, Part1 = Axe, C0 = v, C1 = CFrame.new(0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1), Parent = Axe, } Axe.Parent = Tool end end
function IsTeamMate(Player1, Player2) return (Player1 and Player2 and not Player1.Neutral and not Player2.Neutral and Player1.TeamColor == Player2.TeamColor) end
function CreateNPCModel() local NPCModel = Create("Model"){ Name = ToolName, } local AxeManagerScript = AxeManager:Clone() AxeManagerScript.Disabled = false AxeManagerScript.Parent = NPCModel local RemoverClone = Remover:Clone() local Values = { {Name = "Creator", Class = "ObjectValue", Value = Player}, {Name = "Tool", Class = "ObjectValue", Value = Tool}, } for i, v in pairs(Values) do local Value = Create(v.Class){ Name = v.Name, Value = v.Value, Parent = NPCModel, } end RemoverClone.Disabled = false RemoverClone.Parent = NPCModel return NPCModel end
function SetUpNPC(Figure) NPCData.MakeNPC({NPC = Figure, AIControl = { Creator = Player, Mode = "Follow", MaxDistance = 100, Follow = Player, Offset = Vector3.new(2, 0, 0), GeneralOffset = true, Chase = false, ChaseDistance = 50, ChaseRange = 0, Target = nil, TargetPos = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0), Damage = 0, NormalSpeed = 16, ChaseSpeed = 16, SelfSufficient = false }}) Figure.Name = "AxeMonster" local Humanoid = Figure:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local Torso = Figure:FindFirstChild("Torso") if Humanoid and Torso then Humanoid.Died:connect(function() Debris:AddItem(Figure, 2) end) Humanoid.Jumping:connect(function() end) Figure.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" and not Figure.Parent then Debris:AddItem(Figure, 2) end end) end return Figure end
function SpawnNPC() local Data = NPCModule.GetTable({Key = "MakeNPC", Player = Player}) if not Data then return end NPCData = Data.GetData({Player = Player, Tool = Tool}) NPCReady = false CurrentNPC = {} local NPCModel = CreateNPCModel() NPCData.MakeNPC({NPC = NPCModel, AIControl = {Creator = Player, SelfSufficient = true}}) local BaseNPC = SetUpNPC(NPC:Clone()) NPCModel.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" and not NPCModel.Parent then for i, v in pairs(CurrentNPC) do if v and v.Parent then v:Destroy() end end CurrentNPC = {} Tool.Enabled = false wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true --Handle.Transparency = 0 NPCSpawned = false end end) if Duration then Debris:AddItem(NPCModel, Duration) end NPCModel.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") local function CreatePawn(Offset) local NPCCopy = BaseNPC:Clone() local NPCHumanoid = NPCCopy.Humanoid local NPCTorso = NPCCopy.Torso table.insert(CurrentNPC, NPCCopy) NPCCopy.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" and not NPCCopy.Parent then for i, v in pairs(CurrentNPC) do if v == NPCCopy then table.remove(CurrentNPC, i) if #CurrentNPC == 0 then if NPCModel and NPCModel.Parent then Debris:AddItem(NPCModel, 1) NPCModel:Destroy() end end end end end end) local OffsetValue = NPCCopy.Offset OffsetValue.Value = Offset NPCCopy.Parent = NPCModel NPCTorso.CFrame = ((CFrame.new(Torso.Position) * CFrame.new(OffsetValue.Value) - Vector3.new(0, 0.2, 0)) * CFrame.Angles(Torso.CFrame:toEulerAnglesXYZ())) NPCHumanoid:ChangeState(Enum.HumanoidStateType.Freefall) end for i = 1, 2 do local Offset = ((i == 1 and Vector3.new(-5, 0, -0.5)) or Vector3.new(5, 0, -0.5)) CreatePawn(Offset) end NPCReady = true end
function Activated() if not Tool.Enabled or not ToolEquipped then return end local NPCModel = game:GetService("Workspace"):FindFirstChild(ToolName) if NPCModel then local MouseData = InvokeClient("MouseData") local MousePosition = MouseData.Position local MouseTarget = MouseData.Target for i, v in pairs(CurrentNPC) do if v and v.Parent then local Target = v:FindFirstChild("Target") local TargetPos = v:FindFirstChild("TargetPos") local Mode = v:FindFirstChild("Mode") if Target and TargetPos and Mode then if MouseTarget and MouseTarget.Parent then TargetPos.Value = MousePosition local character = MouseTarget.Parent if character:IsA("Hat") then character = character.Parent end local player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(character) if not player or (player and not IsTeamMate(player, Player)) then local creator = character:FindFirstChild("Creator") local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and (not creator or (creator and creator.Value ~= Player and not IsTeamMate(Player, creator.Value))) then Target.Value = character else Target.Value = nil end else Target.Value = nil end else Target.Value = nil end end end end elseif not NPCModel and not NPCSpawned then --Handle.Transparency = 1 NPCSpawned = true SpawnNPC() end end
function CheckIfAlive() return (((Player and Player.Parent and Character and Character.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Torso and Torso.Parent) and true) or false) end
function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") or Character:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") if not CheckIfAlive() then return end ToolName = (Player.Name .. "'sAxeMonsters") Spawn(function() CreateHandle(false) end) ToolEquipped = true end
function Unequipped() Spawn(function() CreateHandle(true) end) ToolEquipped = false end
function InvokeClient(Mode, Value) local ClientReturn = nil pcall(function() ClientReturn = ClientControl:InvokeClient(Player, Mode, Value) end) return ClientReturn end
function OnServerInvoke(player, Mode, Value) if player ~= Player or not ToolEquipped or not CheckIfAlive() or not Mode or not Value then return end end
Delay(0, (function() CreateHandle(true) end))
ServerControl.OnServerInvoke = OnServerInvoke
Tool.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" and Tool.Parent then --[[Handle.Transparency = ]]CreateHandle(((Tool.Parent:IsA("Backpack") or Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Tool.Parent) and ((not NPCSpawned and true) or false)) or true)) end end)
Tool.Activated:connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Model = script.Parent
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Creator = Model:FindFirstChild("Creator") Tool = Model:FindFirstChild("Tool")
function DestroyModel() Debris:AddItem(Model, 2) end
if not Creator or not Creator.Value or not Creator.Value:IsA("Player") or not Creator.Value.Parent or not Tool or not Tool.Value or not Tool.Value.Parent then DestroyModel() return end
Creator = Creator.Value Tool = Tool.Value
Character = Creator.Character if not Character then DestroyModel() return end
Creator.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" and not Creator.Parent then DestroyModel() end end)
Character.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" and not Character.Parent then DestroyModel() end end)
Tool.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" and (not Tool.Parent or (not Tool.Parent:IsA("Backpack") and not Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Tool.Parent))) then DestroyModel() end end)

--Made by Luckymaxer --Updated for R15 avatar
Model = script.Parent
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris") InsertService = game:GetService("InsertService")
RbxUtility = LoadLibrary("RbxUtility") Create = RbxUtility.Create
BaseUrl = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="
GearModel = InsertService:LoadAsset(315617026) Gear = GearModel:GetChildren()[1]:Clone() Debris:AddItem(GearModel, 1)
Functions = require(script:WaitForChild("Functions"))
Particles = script:WaitForChild("Particles")
Creator = Model:WaitForChild("Creator")
NPCConfiguration = { Name = "AxeMonster", FireRate = {Min = 2, Max = 2}, Damage = 15, }
for i, v in pairs(NPCConfiguration.FireRate) do NPCConfiguration.FireRate[i] = (v * 1000) end
NPCsControlled = false NPCs = {}
BasePart = Create("Part"){ Shape = Enum.PartType.Block, Material = Enum.Material.Plastic, TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom, Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2), CanCollide = true, Locked = true, Anchored = false, }
function ControlNPCs() if NPCsControlled or #NPCs == 0 then return end NPCsControlled = true while #NPCs > 0 do local CreatorPlayer = Functions.GetCreator(Creator) if CreatorPlayer then local HasUpgradeWeapon = false for i, v in pairs({CreatorPlayer.Character, CreatorPlayer.Backpack}) do if v and v.Parent then for ii, vv in pairs(v:GetChildren()) do if vv:IsA("Tool") and vv.Name == Gear.Name and vv.TextureId == Gear.TextureId then HasUpgradeWeapon = true break end end end end local Now = tick() for i, v in pairs(NPCs) do local TargetPlayer = nil if v and v.NPC and v.NPC.Parent and v.Humanoid and v.Humanoid.Health > 0 and v.Torso and v.Torso.Parent then local Axes = v.AxeThrowFunctions.GetAxes() for ii, vv in pairs(Axes) do local AxeParticles = vv:FindFirstChild("AxeParticles") if HasUpgradeWeapon then if not AxeParticles then AxeParticles = Particles:Clone() AxeParticles.Name = "AxeParticles" AxeParticles.Enabled = true AxeParticles.Parent = vv end else local AxeParticles = vv:FindFirstChild("AxeParticles") if AxeParticles then AxeParticles.Name = "Particles" AxeParticles.Enabled = false Debris:AddItem(AxeParticles, 2) end end end if v.Target.Value then local character = v.Target.Value if character and character.Parent then local player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(character) if not player or (player and player ~= CreatorPlayer and not Functions.IsTeamMate(CreatorPlayer, player)) then local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local head = character:FindFirstChild("Head") local torso = character:FindFirstChild("Torso") or character:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and head and torso then TargetPlayer = {Character = character, Humanoid = humanoid, Head = head} if TargetPlayer then local SpawnPos = v.Torso.Position local TargetPos = TargetPlayer.Head.Position local Direction = CFrame.new(SpawnPos, Vector3.new(TargetPos.X, SpawnPos.Y, TargetPos.Z)) local Distance = (SpawnPos - TargetPos).Magnitude local BodyGyro = Create("BodyGyro"){ maxTorque = Vector3.new(math.huge, math.huge, math.huge), cframe = Direction, } Debris:AddItem(BodyGyro, 0.5) BodyGyro.Parent = v.Torso if (Now - v.Throws.Tick) >= v.Throws.Delay and not Functions.CheckUpsideDown(v.Torso.CFrame, Enum.NormalId.Top, (math.pi / 3)) and Distance <= 200 then v.Throws.Tick = Now v.Throws.Delay = (math.random(NPCConfiguration.FireRate.Min, NPCConfiguration.FireRate.Max) * 0.001) v.AxeThrowFunctions.ThrowAxes(TargetPos, (NPCConfiguration.Damage * ((HasUpgradeWeapon and 1.5) or 1))) end end end end end end end end end wait() end NPCsControlled = false end
function FunctionNPC(Child) if not Child:IsA("Model") or not string.find(string.lower(Child.Name), string.lower(NPCConfiguration.Name)) then return end for i, v in pairs(NPCs) do if v and v.NPC and v.NPC == Child then return end end local NPC = Child local Humanoid = NPC:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local Torso = NPC:FindFirstChild("Torso") or NPC:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") local Target = NPC:WaitForChild("Target") local AxeThrowFunctions = require(NPC:WaitForChild("ThrowAxes")) if not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 or not Torso or not Target then return end local ThrowDelay = (math.random(NPCConfiguration.FireRate.Min, NPCConfiguration.FireRate.Max) * 0.001) local Table = { NPC = Child, Humanoid = Humanoid, Torso = Torso, Target = Target, TargetPlayer = nil, AxeThrowFunctions = AxeThrowFunctions, Throws = {Tick = tick(), Delay = ThrowDelay}, } table.insert(NPCs, Table) end
for i, v in pairs(Model:GetChildren()) do FunctionNPC(v) end
Model.ChildAdded:connect(function(Child) FunctionNPC(Child) end)
Model.ChildRemoved:connect(function(Child) for i, v in pairs(NPCs) do if v and v.NPC and v.NPC == Child then table.remove(NPCs, i) break end end end)
ControlNPCs()

--Made by Luckymaxer
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
RbxUtility = LoadLibrary("RbxUtility") Create = RbxUtility.Create
Functions = {}
function Functions.GetCreator(Creator) local CreatorValue = Creator.Value return (((CreatorValue and CreatorValue.Parent and CreatorValue:IsA("Player")) and CreatorValue) or nil) end
function Functions.IsTeamMate(Player1, Player2) return (Player1 and Player2 and not Player1.Neutral and not Player2.Neutral and Player1.TeamColor == Player2.TeamColor) end
function Functions.TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Create("ObjectValue"){ Name = "creator", Value = player, } Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function Functions.UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function Functions.CheckUpsideDown(CFrame, Surface, MaxAngle) local Vector1 = CFrame:vectorToWorldSpace(Vector3.FromNormalId(Surface)) local Vector2 = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) local Angle = math.acos(Vector1:Dot(Vector2)) return (Angle > MaxAngle) end
function Functions.CheckTableForString(Table, String) for i, v in pairs(Table) do if string.find(string.lower(String), string.lower(v)) then return true end end return false end
function Functions.CheckIntangible(Hit) local ProjectileNames = {"Water", "Arrow", "Projectile", "Effect", "Rail", "Laser", "Bullet"} if Hit and Hit.Parent then if ((not Hit.CanCollide or Hit.Parent:IsA("Hat") or Functions.CheckTableForString(ProjectileNames, Hit.Name)) and not Hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")) then return true end end return false end
function Functions.CastRay(StartPos, Vec, Length, Ignore, DelayIfHit) local Ignore = ((type(Ignore) == "table" and Ignore) or {Ignore}) local RayHit, RayPos, RayNormal = game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList(Ray.new(StartPos, Vec * Length), Ignore) if RayHit and Functions.CheckIntangible(RayHit) then if DelayIfHit then wait() end RayHit, RayPos, RayNormal = Functions.CastRay((RayPos + (Vec * 0.01)), Vec, (Length - ((StartPos - RayPos).magnitude)), Ignore, DelayIfHit) end return RayHit, RayPos, RayNormal end
return Functions

Properties.string: Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.
